column5: You'll love this little taste of country still within 20 min of everything happening in the city of Austin.  Circuit of the Americas (10-15 min down Highway 130)  Downtown (15 min no traffic)  Zilker Park (20 min no traffic)  Austin-Bergstrom International Airport (15-20 min down i35, 183 or 130)  University of Texas at Austin (10-15 min)
column8: Taste of Country in the City
